Reviews.Title: “No room to swing a cat”
Reviews.Author: Mir929
Reviews.Content: looking forward italy time excited finally decided hotel booked agents failed expected 4 star experience course read trip advisor contributions bit intimidated booked triple arrival double additional bed front desk tv practically bed main drawback location 50 metres termini lot eat shopping cleaned day breakfast ok day bit rough evening night brawl chinese restaurant opposite hotel police intervene overall nice stay plenty didnt terrible infrastructure metro awful cry underground london recommend hotel location nice friendly staff definitely 4star hotel absurd tourist tax pay checkout 3 euro person night

Reviews.Title: “Really nice!”
Reviews.Author: Laura C
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel luce week hotel close termini station public transport options cheap restaurants nearby staff helpful breakfast pretty critic sometimes hear people talking door disturbing

Reviews.Title: “Lovely little hotel”
Reviews.Author: blairv149
Reviews.Content: staying hotel partner lovely comfortable clean hotel staff polite helpful spoke english hotel 5 min walk main train terminal fault hotel sit drink evening tea coffee facilities

Reviews.Title: “Ideal for a short stay”
Reviews.Author: Jumperc
Reviews.Content: wife rome 30th anniversary caught leonardo express airport centre hotel luce 200 yards station ideal location metro walking near station easy staff helpful comfortable breakfast plenty restaurants nearby offering reasonably priced menus id recommend fixed priced menus

Reviews.Title: “A nice central location”
Reviews.Author: naterbox
Reviews.Content: hotel situated stones throw termini main train station bus terminus metro lines cross plenty eat nearby covering price ranges staff reception friendly speak perfect english sort queries regarding sightseeing transport etc hotel clean furnishings fashioned wardrobes weird incorporated headboard 207 chair air conditioning efficient husband finding news channel english finally managed day im surprised 4 star rating considering limited choice breakfast meal serve person tables replenish cold buffet wash doesnt understand english coffee machine undrinkable stuck tea

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, shame about the staff.”
Reviews.Author: Lucy071175
Reviews.Content: hotel benefits location visit rome unsure stay travel agents recommendation near termini station location exploring rome worried noisy wasnt windows closed air con unit slept babies clean amenities cleaned daily towels changed basic mini bar restocked breakfast ok basic fine filled ourselves romes culinary delights whilst hotel staff raise smile engage conversation boyfriend learnt italian prior trip eager try greeted odd grunt im glad didnt urgent help advice response recommendation based solely location service ok hotel definitely 4 star

Reviews.Title: “A very good for touristic needs”
Reviews.Author: JuliettaR
Reviews.Content: stayed luce hotel 3 days april touristic trip nice designed kingsize comfy bed bathroom spacious cabin towels changed day soap shampoo refilled daily breakfast standard continental breakfast rome jam toasts muesli thin sliced cheese ham croissants coffee start day meet rome sights hotel location perfect center 25 min walk colosseum 3 minutes walk metro railway station hotel choice touristic reasonable price free wifi

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel with Good Location”
Reviews.Author: westie007
Reviews.Content: hotel fairly friendly polite staff speak english stated previous reviews unless planning actually move beds comfy shower facilities nice hot breakfast selection plenty hotel 2 mins walk roma termini location jump metro various sites rome metro day found useful close walking appreciate overall lovley hotel goin rome spend fortune didnt beauty city deffinately stay return

Reviews.Title: “Good clean Hotel in a good location to visit Rome - but more a three star rather than the four star it is listed as”
Reviews.Author: OlbasUk
Reviews.Content: stay clean little bathroom decent comfortable bed air con bedrooms windows noisy times breakfast basic ok except coffee excellent helpful english speaking reception staff location fine corner termini station shuttle airports buses major sights easily walked centre rome occassions hotel avoid trattoria gemma alla road hotel awful food terrible service rip wine prices

Reviews.Title: “Very convenient hotel located in fine seat and the close personnel”
Reviews.Author: PazzaB
Reviews.Content: hotel close personnel breakfast little bit pure bed fresh toilet accessories towels close train station termini subway convenient reach seat lot restaurants rome necessarily lodge hotel thanks fine rest

Reviews.Title: “Good tourist hotel”
Reviews.Author: jeff_london2010
Reviews.Content: 4 star international standards public apart breakfast base touring rome looking reasonably priced comfortable breakfast facilities salubrious 2 minutes walk main railway metro station airport shuttle bus reasonable walking distance main sights breakfast reasonable little shop door basic budget hotel probably stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice small hotel”
Reviews.Author: korden
Reviews.Content: cozy hotel luce short walk central railway station termini comfortable rest busy day decorated beautiful italian style inside wardrobes free safe main architectural monuments rome walking vicinity hotel clean breakfast modest stay hungry

Reviews.Title: “Small and good hotel”
Reviews.Author: olbga
Reviews.Content: hotel pleased location near termini station attractions hotel properly clean nice walked time little night strained breakfast walked friend eat breakfast breakfast hotel bit pricey service

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable & freindly”
Reviews.Author: UKAID
Reviews.Content: whilst hotel doesnt compare uk 4 clean comfortable hotel short stay location exploring sites rome nice restaurant located door airport drop 1 minutes walk hotel staff extremely helpful excellent english

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Luce
HotelInfo.Address: Via Magenta 34, 00185 Rome, Italy
